dmca.title: Dow slap Yes Men and upstream ISP for parody/remix
dmca.body:
The C&D was sent to Verio, but Verio isn't even the ISP of the
parody site.  The C&D alleged copyright (on small image files),
but mostly trademark and Lanham Act, including defamation.  They
used the copyright hook to get Verio to take down the entire ISP
under the DMCA.

The story of what happened is here:

http://theyesmen.org/dow/#story

The notice itself is :
<hr>
Dear Verio:

This law firm represents The Dow Chemical Company (
dmca.recipient_name: Verio, Inc. (upstream OSP for The Yes Men)
